headline.main: Natalie Portman Had Second Baby, Days Before Oscar Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Natalie Portman Had Second Baby, Days Before Oscar Ceremony

lead_paragraph: A federal complaint unsealed on Friday in Federal District Court in Manhattan charged Juan Thompson, a former reporter, with making more than a half-dozen bomb threats against Jewish community centers, schools and a museum, partly in an effort to intimidate a former girlfriend.
